Shore Storage Manager Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:

append_file_iPseudo-iterator used to append to a file

atomic_containerA thread-safe, lock-free, almost wait-free atomic container for untyped items

memory_block::block_listA helper class for block_pool<T...>, (a heap of T objects), and which contains one of these lists
memory_block::block_of_chipsControl structure for one block of allocatable memory. This control block is imposed on a chunk of memory allocated by some other allocator, and this manages some number of fixed-sized chips that fit into this block
block_pool< T, Pool, MaxBytes >A factory for speedier allocation from the heap

This class may be used in a limited way for the handling of out-of-log-space conditions. See Running Out of Log Space
